extendedInfo.description: Truth or Dare?Burst out of the closet in style with this gay friendly truth or dare app.With 3 levels of spicy dares and questions, this is the raunchiest game there is!Choose to either answer a question truthfully or, if you have the kahuna's... try one of our huge database of embarrassing sexy Dares!ADD YOUR OWN TRUTH OR DARES!In addition to our huge database of questions and dares, you can add your own!Ever wanted to see a friend suck a lemon? Well now's your chance, add it into the dare section and hope it doesn't backfire and land on you!!Quick Start or Full Game modes:Want to jump straight in and answer questions or complete dares? Then just dive straight into Quick Start mode, no setup required.Want the game to keep score and challenge your friends to multiple rounds of Truth Or Dare?Then try full game mode â enter each players name, the number of rounds you want to play â and see who is the most honest, or bravest player at the end!Own the very best, most customisable Truth or Dare app available, download today!

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Great app for gay or straight people,  some very funny dares!
reviews.author: Andy Smith

reviews.title: Great Truth or Dare
reviews.comment: Thank you for a great app.will try your other apps as well.
reviews.author: Alarm Clock
